#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define FOR1(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define MAX 10000007
#define ll long long int
#define fastScan ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(NULL);
 int main()
{
	fastScan;
	ll t,i,l;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	 string s;
	 cin>>s;
	 l = s.length();
	 for(i=(l/2)-1;i>=0;i--)
	 {
	 	cout<<s[i];
	 } 
	 for(i=l-1;i>=l/2;i--)
	 {
	 	cout<<s[i];
	 }
	 cout<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
